note: I was born in Georgetown, Guyana worked and studied in London before relocating to Sweden in late 1969. Took a BA in Eng & Edu. Worked as a hospital orderly and later as a mental health counsellor. In 2015 my debut book, Strangers in Another Country, appeared. Since then, I published some short stories, novellas, and a coming-of-age novel Making Sense of Past Time. My hobbies are listening to mostly jazz, reading & writing, and nature photography.
